name: Chivione
description:
Chivione is a 2D Action Adventure Puzzle game with  RPG elements. it is currently in very early development and I am sharing it so that I can receive feedback on my work.

You play as the son of a tradesman who has fled his home town after it was ransacked by people unknown to. You don't know what happened between leaving the town and now, but you have found yourself on board a ship sailing to unknown lands.

The game play is somewhat inspired by 'The Binding of Isaac' however currently is planned to take place in a primarily melee fashion. You will fight enemies and solve puzzles and mysteries with very little hand holding to make your way through the game and uncover what happened to you and the people around you.

Note: this game is still in very early development and I expect you will find lots of bugs/issues and if you do please leave a comment on the page or on my discord server.

Controls:

  • WASD: move
  • Arrow Keys: direction attack
  • E: interact
  • Space: Scroll through text
  • Control: Sit (toggle)
